entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unable to execute command for SwipeItem with screen reader on Android #23478
  • [Android] Layouting issues inside CarouselView DataTemplate #23475
  • unable to debug android apps on Linux #23472

Closed

  • Frame with custom ControlTemplate not rendering #23476
  • File picker multi select #14996
    Under Consideration

PullRequests

Created

  • [iOS] CarouselView: Changing Position after navigation away then comi… #23477
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, migration-compatibility
  • [Windows] Make `WebView.CaptureAsync()` work #23474
    community ✨
  • [Android] Map FlowDirection of shell to PlatformView on Android #23473
    community ✨
  • Visual state change for disabled RadioButton #23471
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-radiobutton

Updated

  • Tab Selected Icon Color not changing if using Font icons - fix #22437
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #22927
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
